attributes.action: Restore the EU Referendum’s legitimacy: Post Brexit The Movie DVDs to every home
attributes.additional_details: The national debate about the EU referendum must be fair and balanced for the outcome to have any legitimacy. The Electoral Commission has stated that the government’s pro-EU leaflets have created an “unfair advantage” for Remain. Brexit: The Movie – which will be free to watch via the Internet from 11th May – makes the case for Leave in a factual, relevant, accessible and entertaining way. The government can restore legitimacy to the referendum by sending a DVD of the film to every UK home.
attributes.background: Cameron has rigged the EU Referendum by using £9.3 million of taxpayer money to mail pro-EU leaflets to every UK household. The government must now restore legitimacy and fairness by also mailing to every home a DVD of Brexit: The Movie, which makes the case for why the UK should Leave the EU.

rejection.details:
The UK Government isn't responsible for distributing copies of Brexit: The Movie, or any other film. 

You might be interested in signing the following petition calling on the Government to put the case for leaving the EU on its referendum leaflets: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/126854
